text: Camillo Pavanello (20 October 1879 - 7 July 1951) was an Italian gymnast. He competed in the men's individual all-around event at the 1900 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1879 births Category:1951 deaths Category:Italian male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Genoa
title: Camillo Pavanello
